== Concept ==

The goal of our distribution is to bring the GNOME experience to the Ubuntu desktop. That means we use the latest technologies available, such as GTK+3 and GNOME Shell.
For our first release, we are keeping GNOME's visual elements. Adwaita is the brand new visual style that came up with the beautiful GNOME 3.0.

== Branding ==
For Ubuntu GNOME's first official release as an Ubuntu flavour, there wasn't time to create rigorous visual branding, just the one used on our social media pages.
